missions.title: Discover the Heart of Chillán
missions.description: Explore the most emblematic places in Chillán's historic center

points.name: Plaza de Armas
points.description: The heart of the city, completely rebuilt after the 1939 earthquake

points.name: San Bartolomé Cathedral
points.description: Majestic modern cathedral, symbol of Chillán's reconstruction

points.name: Chillán Market
points.description: Vibrant gastronomic center where local flavors and traditions converge

missions.title: San Carlos Flavors Route
missions.description: Immerse yourself in the most authentic gastronomic tradition of San Carlos

points.name: Artisanal Sausage Factory
points.description: Learn about the traditional process of making the famous San Carlos longaniza

points.name: Municipal Market
points.description: Taste fresh local products and regional specialties

points.name: San Carlos Main Square
points.description: Nerve center of the city with rich local history

missions.title: Natural Treasures of Ñuble
missions.description: Discover the impressive natural beauty of the Ñuble region

points.name: Chillán Hot Springs
points.description: Relax in natural thermal waters surrounded by mountains

points.name: Chillán Snow-capped Mountains
points.description: Enjoy spectacular panoramic views of the mountain range

points.name: Las Trancas Valley
points.description: Explore this beautiful mountain valley full of wildlife

missions.title: Ancestral Crafts and Traditions
missions.description: Learn about artisanal traditions that have endured for generations

points.name: Black Pottery Workshop
points.description: Observe the creation of the famous Quinchamalí black pottery

points.name: Artisan's House
points.description: Discover ancestral clay working techniques

points.name: Pottery Museum
points.description: Learn about the history and evolution of this tradition

missions.title: Wine Route in Ñuble
missions.description: Explore Chile's oldest winemaking tradition

points.name: Heritage Vineyard
points.description: Visit vineyards with centennial País and Moscatel vines

points.name: Traditional Winery
points.description: Learn ancestral winemaking methods in clay vessels

points.name: Heritage Wine Tasting
points.description: Taste unique wines with denomination of origin

missions.title: History Trails
missions.description: Walk through the places that marked the region's history

points.name: Battle of Yungay Museum
points.description: Learn about the Chilean victory in the Pacific War

points.name: Heroes Monument
points.description: Pay tribute to those who fell in the historic battle

points.name: Battlefield
points.description: Walk through the place where the decisive battle was fought

missions.title: Adventure at Salto del Laja

points.name: Main Viewpoint
points.description: Contemplate the waterfall from the most spectacular viewpoint

points.name: Riverside Trail
points.description: Walk along the Laja River and discover its ecosystem

points.name: Picnic Area
points.description: Enjoy an outdoor lunch with a view of the waterfall

missions.title: Mapuche Culture in Ñuble

points.name: Nguillatún Ceremony
points.description: Learn about sacred Mapuche ceremonies

points.name: Silverwork Workshop
points.description: Observe the creation of traditional Mapuche jewelry

points.name: Oak Trail
points.description: Walk among centennial oaks and observe native fauna

points.name: Condor Viewpoint
points.description: Look for condors and other birds of prey in their natural habitat

points.name: Hidden Lagoon
points.description: Discover this pristine lagoon surrounded by native forest

missions.title: Festivals and Traditions of Ñuble
missions.description: Participate in traditional celebrations that keep local culture alive

points.name: Longaniza Festival

points.name: Harvest Festival
points.description: Participate in the traditional grape harvest celebration

points.name: Chilean Rodeo

points.description: Relax in the center of this welcoming city

points.name: Cultural Center
